title: PM chairs high-level meeting to discuss upcoming China visit
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 26 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan Wednesday chaired a high-level meeting to discuss his upcoming visit to China.
During the meeting, the prime minister was briefed on the ongoing conversation with the Chinese authorities on projects in the fields of investment, trade, information technology and exports to enhance bilateral cooperation, during the prime ministerâ€™s visit.
Federal ministers Shah Mahmood Qureshi, Hammad Azhar, Shaukat Tarin, Fawad Chaudhry, Asad Umar, Commerce Adviser Abdur Razzak Dawood, National Security Adviser Moeed Yusuf, Chief of the Army Staff General Qamar Javed Bajwa, Special Assistant on CPEC Khalid Mansoor and senior officers attended the meeting.
